column4: hell o.. where can i change the size for the gnome-icons in toolbars?
ah ...  not talking about the gnome-panels - i am talking about toolbars inside of the windows ... floris84
you can raise the size of your gnome-panel. the icons will grow with it. in order to do this right click a blank spot on the panel and do properties
maybe somewhere in gconf-editor.. navigate to apps/nautilus and see there
